DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study healthy volunteer assess relative bioavailability PF-05175157 powder-in-capsule tablet formulation effect food pharmacokinetics tablet formulation .
DOC.brief_title: A Healthy Volunteer Study To Assess Relative Bioavailability Of Powder-In-Capsule And A Tablet Formulation And The Effect Of Food On The Pharmacokinetics Of The Tablet Formulation
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 18 55 year , inclusive Women must non childbearing potential Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 25 35 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) disease clinical finding Screening . Active ocular disease include infection , glaucoma , seasonal allergy , dry eye symptom , optic nerve disease retinal disease . History habitual smoking past 5 year history evidence habitual use ( non smoke ) tobacco nicotinecontaining product within 3 month Screening positive cotinine test Screening Day 0
